title: 经过排除法，1.4.2中文输入补丁貌似有问题
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
以下错误发生于开启多人游戏选项之后再点击“完成”时出现：




      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
This error has been saved to D:\Minecraft\preview\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-10-28_11.06.11-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 9396a09e --------
Generated 12-10-28 上午11:06

- Minecraft Version: 1.4.2
- Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_07, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
- Memory: 449206856 bytes (428 MB) / 523501568 bytes (499 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
- JVM Flags: 3 total; -Xincgc -Xms512m -Xmx1024m
- AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
- FML: MCP v7.19 FML v4.2.6.422 Minecraft Forge 6.0.1.341 7 mods loaded, 7 mods active
    mcp [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
    FML [Forge Mod Loader] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
    Forge [Minecraft Forge] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
    mod_CodeChickenCore [CodeChicken Core] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
    mod_NotEnoughItems [Not Enough Items] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
    mod_ReiMinimap [mod_ReiMinimap] ([1.4.2]ReiMinimap_v3.2_05.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
    mod_InvTweaks [Inventory Tweaks] (InvTweaks-1.44-1.4.2.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
- LWJGL: 2.4.2
- OpenGL: GeForce GT 130M/PCI/SSE2 GL version 3.0.0, NVIDIA Corporation
- Is Modded: Definitely; 'forge,fml'
- Type: Client
- Texture Pack: Default
- Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
- Vec3 Pool Size: ~ERROR~ NullPointerException: null

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: tk.dearice.minecraft.InputConfig.changeConfig(Ljava/lang/String;)V
    at arn.a(arn.java:91)
    at asw.a(asw.java:68)

    at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:779)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

复制代码

不知大家又没有遇到
我通过排除法得知必然是中文补丁引起的问题

replies.author: aa210063654
replies.txt_content:
发现GT130M!
嘛嘛.不是还有其他的中文输入么

aa210063654 发表于 2012-10-28 11:13 
发现GT130M!
嘛嘛.不是还有其他的中文输入么
求教{:10_535:}

replies.author: Dear_ICE
replies.txt_content:
的确是这个问题，附件中没有修改新的类。
地址已经更新。

replies.author: sjjklh
replies.txt_content:
Dear_ICE 发表于 2012-10-28 12:02  的确是这个问题，附件中没有修改新的类。  地址已经更新。
辛苦ICE了
